wikipedia_page.main: Kate Bradbury Griffith aka Kate Griffith (née Bradbury) (26 August 1854 – 2 March 1902) was a British Egyptologist who assisted in the early development of the Egypt Exploration Society and the Department of Egyptology at University College London (UCL).

response: * August 26 - Kate Bradbury Griffith, English Egyptologist (d. 1902)
* March 2 – Kate Bradbury Griffith, English Egyptologist (b. 1854)
